CustomField.description: JSON array defining the backend configuration fields for this action. Each field object should include: name, type, required (optional), help (optional), placeholder (optional), label (optional), defaultValue (optional).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: JSON array of field descriptors for backend configuration. Example: [{"name":"objectApiName","type":"string","required":true,"help":"The SObject API name","placeholder":"Account"}]
CustomField.label: Config Schema
